file_content.text: We'll get this place in order, never fear.
The Padawans are a bit shaky, but they're alive. They wanted to stay so I cleared them a path.
That's brave of them--but not what the Council wanted. I hope they'll be alright.
Take care of them. They're coming out of this angry.
They may be dangerous.
I'll make sure their Masters know. It wouldn't be the first time a Jedi's scars ran deep.
Many of the natives died, but there was no way to take them all out.
There are still Flesh Raiders.
Don't worry, we have experienced Jedi coming to do just that.
No more Padawans will be allowed into the Gnarls until we've repelled the Flesh Raiders.
That's it?
It may seem like it, but knowing the Padawans are safe is something. And there will be no more training here until we've cleared the area.
The beacon worked and a rescue speeder is on its way. You really came through for those Padawans.
One of them was injured--you need to send a medic with the rescue team.
The students will need help.
Standard procedure. They're in good hands.
There were Flesh Raiders at every turn--I'm sure many of them are still out there.
I found enemies everywhere.
Don't worry, we've got experienced Jedi on the way.
Not much of a watchman, are you?
You really failed at your job.
I do what I can. It's all any of us can do.
You probably want to get back to your trials. Again, thank you and may the Force be with you.
Those Padawans are depending on you--I can't take down a Flesh Raider.
Padawan, come here quickly. The training grounds are not safe today.
Knight Weller sent me to help with the Flesh Raiders. I'm combat trained and ready to help.
That's why I'm here.
Then the Force is with us. Few Padawans here can make that claim.
I got a basic briefing from Knight Weller, but I'd like a full report before going in.
Tell me what you know.
I'm here to push back the Flesh Raiders, and I don't need you slowing me down.
Out of my way, guard.
If you're going out there, I'll make it short and sweet. Your fellow Padawans are going to need your help.
The Flesh Raiders moved into the training grounds organized and ready, attempting to isolate various groups of Padawans.
There's a group of students in the hills we lost track of. They're not combat trained.
I'll bring them back.
I always expected my trials would be a challenge.
I assume danger is the point.
Normally we minimize the danger until a Padawan is settled in and trained.
Tell me what's going on, I may be able to assist.
What seems to be the matter?
You're Master Yuon's Padawan, yes? Then you've got combat training... okay, maybe you can help.
This where I'm supposed to run away and then be told later I failed the trial? Not likely.
You don't scare me.
That's disturbingly paranoid, Padawan. We are here to test, not trick you.
You're Yuon's apprentice though, aren't you? We could certainly put your combat training to use.
The short version is we have Flesh Raiders invading the training grounds, and a group of Padawans without combat skills is trapped in the hills.
Master Yuon mentioned the natives briefly.
What is a Flesh Raider?
They are a savage people who occasionally raid the local settlements and devour those they kidnap.
Before today, we thought they didn't understand technology, but they're packing blasters and vibroblades and turning them on Padawans who aren't trained to defend themselves.
I'll find the Padawans.
Tell me what I can do.
I'll go teach these Flesh Raiders to respect our borders.
The natives need a lesson.
This isn't about aggression, Padawan, remember that.
I can't help. [Refuse quest]
Don't worry, those Padawans will get home safe. I promise.
We'll get them back.
Just let me know what's required. I'm here to help.
What do you need me to do?
I've got a beacon here. If you can find the Padawans and set the beacon, we'll send an evac shuttle fast as we can.
A group of Jedi from the temple is headed this way but maybe not fast enough. May the Force be with you.
I understand your dilemma, but I've got my own mission to deal with.
I'm busy. [Refuse quest]
Of course. Please be safe. Personally, I'd prefer if you just waited it out.
This area is meant for training Padawans, but it's not safe today.
